name: Twistlock Labs - GKE - Tampering with Twistlock configuration
script: jpath("protoPayload.resourceName") contains "namespaces/twistlock/" and not jpath("protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail") startswith "system:" and not jpath("protoPayload.methodName") contains "pods"
description: Audit changes to Twistlock objects, such as the Defender daemonset on GKE
message: Suspicious changes to Twistlock objects detected on GKE
